# [10.1 The Nearest Planets: An Overview](https://openstax.org/books/astronomy-2e/pages/10-1-the-nearest-planets-an-overview)

# Terrestrial Properties {.smaller}

|Property|Earth|Venus|Mars|
|--------|-----|-----|----|
|Semimajor axis (AU)|10|0.72|1.52|
|Period (year)|10|0.61|1.88|
|Mass (Earth = 1)|10|0.82|0.11|
|Diameter ( Earth = 1)|10|0.95|0.53|
|Density (g/cm3)|5.5|5.3|3.9|
|Surface gravity (Earth = 1)|10|0.91|0.38|
|Escape velocity (km/s)|11.2|10.4|5|
|Rotation period (hours or days)|23.9 h|243 d|24.6 h|
|Atmospheric pressure (bar)|10|90|0.007|
